website_summaries.verdict: With ample storage (25 cubic feet) and a decent price, this is a deluxe side-by-side refrigerator that is also affordable.
pros: Door bins can accommodate gallon-size containers
cons: Occasional complaints about the ice dispenser dripping water

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed. It is almost impossible to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed. Unless using a very small cup, it is almost impossible to use the ice dispenser without also inadvertently pushing the water dispenser button and making a huge mess (zoom in to see what I mean more clearly). Also, the water dispenser randomly stops working for no apparent reason. UPDATE: only 2 months into purchase and now the ice dispenser has stopped working (yes, the arm is down like it should be).
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hilton

customer_reviews.title: The spout to the ice maker is behind the spout/push ...
customer_reviews.text: The spout to the ice maker is behind the spout/push button for the waters every time you get ice you accidentally hit the water button too. Also you can only use small glasses if you want to get ice straight into your cup because the opening is so short.
customer_reviews.author: cashmere

customer_reviews.title: Such a great price and wonderful side by side refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price and wonderful side by side refrigerator. We ordered it after the one in the garage died. Within a few days we had our new one. The guys that showed up were amazing!!!! Great attitudes and service. Wish everyone's attitudes were as great as theirs. We have a steep driveway so they had to park on the street and haul it up with no complaints. Not only that they were friendly, smiling and joyful. Wow!!! I've got to say it was the best experience!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeorge Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: I love this refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: As I said before, I love this refrigerator. It replaces a highly over-priced KitchenAid unit that failed after 5 years of use. It is better than the KitchenAid in every way, particularly for maintaining the correct freezer and refrigerator temperatures. The authorized KitchenAid repairman said that the current line of refrigerators can expect to last only 5 to 7 years. He said not to buy an expensive refrigerator, especially one with separate freezer and evaporator coils. As usual, Amazon's service was amazing. I ordered it on a Friday and had it in my home on Monday. Local sources needed 3 weeks to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Bermuda Shorts

customer_reviews.title: Everything matters.
customer_reviews.text: While obviously a fine refrigerator, a design flaw in the water/ice delivery system has quite put me out. While getting ice, it is way too easy to inadvertently send water all over the front of the unit, making a mess and making me mad. I will live with it but I don’t like it and won’t recommend this refrigerator to anyone. Having said this, the Amazon installation and removal service was impressively professional and cost effective (free), at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very good Refrigerator for a very good price !! Great delivery service !!!
customer_reviews.text: The Refrigerator looks good and I have no complaints at this point, I just received it, For 849 you cant beat it !! with through door water and Ice dispenser. I will keep you up dated as time goes on !! One thing for sure the delivery service was great !!! right on time and set everything up !!
customer_reviews.author: TRUTH

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected. I think our RV fridge was bigger. Also had a spot for an additional tray with no tray...? ( although that is in the picture that way, so no surprise. What was the biggest disappointment was it suddenly quit working after only 2 MONTHS! Yes 2 months! Even the repair guy couldn't believe it! I would suggest buyers look elsewhere after having lost hundreds of dollars worth of groceries! So disappointing from Kenmore!!
customer_reviews.author: team1

customer_reviews.title: Great company fast service
customer_reviews.text: I love this refrigerator quiet the color is perfect silver the price amazing. It replaced a black refrigerator which in my kitchen was all you saw and the new one is bigger. Moving it we did bump it but you have to look for it to find the spot. Careful when shoving into ice maker side I put a chip in the plastic against the top of it. Their is one result I put a small square basket which catches overflow ice and it still comes out regularly, the appliance arrived fast and they offered to set it up we did it ourselves a plus great service will buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Eunice S. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good basic fridge, delivery was a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fridge about 45 days now and have had no problems with it. It keeps everything cold, the ice maker works great, and the black finish looks sleek. I saw some other reviews saying that the ice maker and cold water dispenser levers were too close together. That issue must have been fixed as the ice maker lever is below and recessed from the cold water dispenser, you couldn't mix them up now. The online delivery and pickup of my old fridge went perfect. The installers took away the old fridge and installed the new one quickly. The whole process was a heck of a lot easier then going to a box store like Lowes or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Chad W. Green

customer_reviews.title: Beware of possible theft, damage to your property during move, and not have the item installed
customer_reviews.text: Ran 80 minutes late. Damaged tile in process of moving. Movers filled out site survey on my behalf then asked for me to hit submit without showing the survey. Did not have the parts to install the refrigerator. Did not take all the extra trash. After the fact discovered my front windows were unlocked during the move. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fridge for the price. The team that did the delivery, installation, and haul away of the old fridge were right on time and did a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: PeachTeach

customer_reviews.title: Repair needed less than 60 days after purchase. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First repair needed less than 2 months after purchase. Ice maker starts crushing ice and will not switch back to cubed. Now at 6 months after purchase we have the exact same problem. We don’t even use crushed ice so the option is never chosen. Same problem requiring parts twice in 6 months is not good. Regretting this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Had to refuse delivery since the product dimensions displayed by the Kenmore Customer Service team are completely bogus. "Thank you for your inquiry. The measurements for the Kenmore 51823 are depth 34.375" x Width 32.75 x 66.75. Since this is a standard depth refrigerator it stands away from the counters so it will fit is a 33 wide by 66 high space. By Kenmore Customer Service MANUFACTURER on July 31, 2018" You actually need about 35.5". Don't let this be your expensive mistake. Refuse shipment if you only have a 33" space
customer_reviews.author: Ian C Rust

customer_reviews.title: DIMENSIONS ARE WRONG . MUCH WIDER THAN SPECIFICATIONS . IT IS 36" WIDE
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is 36" wide. Previously the specifications said 32 inches. They now say 35 inches. This refrigerator is 36" wide. It's already scratched from pulling it out to clean behind it. The manufacturer still has this statement in Amazon's questions and this is a correction to an earlier dimension.......check it out.............Thank you for your inquiry. The measurements for the Kenmore 51823 are depth 34.375" x Width 32.75 x 66.75. Since this is a standard depth refrigerator it stands away from the counters so it will fit is a 33 wide by 66 high space. By Kenmore Customer Service MANUFACTURER on July 31, 2018 Do not buy unless you have 38" of width so the hinge can clear the wall......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T.

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I just need to say that the delivery guys were SO professional, friendly, helpful, and amazing! Secondly, the fridge is fantastic! No dents, doesn't show fingerprints, is not loud, cooled down fast, there wasn't excess grease anywhere, and the delivery guys removed all of the plastic film. I had none of the issues that others mentioned. I highly recommend this refrigerator and cannot believe the price. You definitely get your money worth!!!!! I am one highly satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doors are not aligned
customer_reviews.text: The doors were not properly installed. Please have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: JThree

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this fridge, too soon to tell, but looks great so far. Replaced a 14 year old GE Profile that died. Delivery was on time and the 2 guys did a fantastic and courteous job of delivering and hauling away of the old GE.
customer_reviews.author: william shaw

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars. Prolly more like 3.96.
customer_reviews.text: I realized I'm grown, so I bought my first "grown-up" fridge. It's a nice, middle-of-the-road "mama, I made it" type of joint. I've had it about 6 months now and can say I still like it. I like that it dispense water and ice, but the light in the dispenser area doesn't really light up anything, so I'm still guessing where my cup is when I fill it in a dark kitchen. Oh yeah, and the light in the freezer exploded like the day I plugged it in. I finally replaced it the other day, and it won't turn on. So I mean...4 stars. Prolly more like 3.96.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: SO big, working great...now this?
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were at the stove when we heard a CRACK from this 3 month old (NEW) fridge. We opened the doors and found that the ice maker (which was set to "OFF") had broken (from cold???) and there was now a gaping hole in the ice container bottom, where now we can see wiring. Kind of freaky. I'll see if I can deal with it through the warranty. Hope I don't have to have a new one delivered. Not saying this will happen to you, but....
customer_reviews.author: leslie benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Set up
customer_reviews.text: My Kenmore refrigerator was supposed to be delivered and set up. I had asked about hook up and was told that the hook up was included. There was no set up (leveling, etc.) nor was there any hook up. I now have to hire a plumber to hook up my ice maker on my new refrigerator................very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Srenaski

customer_reviews.title: BAD DELIVERY & HOOK UP, Great refrigerator for what I can use.
customer_reviews.text: The add stated free hook up, but they only hook it up if you have an existing water line and the shut off for it is right were the refrigerator goes. I have no idea where the shut off for mine is. It might be in my garage, my heater room, or even in the kitchen cabinet under my sink, but they were not looking for it. So now I have this beautiful refrigerator and can not use the ice maker or water features on it until I have the plumber come out and pay $125 for him to come hook it up.
customer_reviews.author: mhcct

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fake digital buttons
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is ok. What I am most disappointed about are the buttons that control the ice, night light, and lock system.These are not digital, even though they look like that are. The buttons are hidden behind a silver plastic cover, and until you push them and feel the round elevation behind the cover, you don't realize that they are not digital. This specific feature of the fridge is cheap at best. We could also use another drawer. Two is ok, but not optimal.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.B

customer_reviews.title: A little frosty
customer_reviews.text: After 2yrs and 2 months defrost stopped working. Refrigerator side does not cool due to the evaporator frozen up caused by the heating element not coming on to defrost it. Called a service tech to fix. would do myself but I cant get both my arms in to remove the element. If that is what the problem is and it isn't the klixon or a defrost timer malfunction. Anyway I'm disappointed in kenmore that I am having to call a repairman which is probably going to charge a lot to fix an appliance that is only 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: K Gdner

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator appears to be working fine but water does not always come out cold
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator appears to be working fine but water does not always come out cold. Glad I have an ice dispenser for that.
customer_reviews.author: ICEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Ad Details are incorrect and/or misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Misleading: AD should state .... 'basic' delivery and 'basic' hook up. (they would not lift fridge over counter to fit into kitchen space. ; and they would not hookup ice maker without a water valve already present in fridge location) Incorrect: AD states..."refrigerator is lit up by ....LEDs"... (the inside is lit by incandescent lights, NOT LEDs) Would have given 1 star, but giving 3 stars because delivery personnel was kind, courteous, professional, attention to detail was fantastic.. they get a 5.
customer_reviews.author: philip g wolfmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge for the price! Very happy and more spacious than I thought. Someone asked if there’s an issue dispensing water and ice and we have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Its fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this refrigerator sight unseen, a leap of faith. We love it ! Nice , easy to clean doors. The water/ice feature works great. It just took a while for the water to taste good. No problems. Delivery was effortless. A nice shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: mydogtrainer

customer_reviews.title: 1 st unit was defective!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a nice new fridge on amazon and noticed the loud noise as soon as I plugged it in!!! Let the unit sit for 24 hours and nothing was cold inside. Got back on the phone with amazon customer service and within minutes had a new unit being deliver before we moved into our new home. This gave us the ability to let it cool for another 24 hours. Within 5 min you could tell it was cooling properly. Thanks for the great service provided by amazon and it affiliates!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Good... For the price.
customer_reviews.text: Considering this is the lowest price fridge of its size and type, there’s really not too much bad to say about it. Things to know before you buy it... The plastic parts like the door shelves, our extremely chintzy And will probably break within two years. Also the water and ice dispenser in the door is very badly designed. if you use a larger cups, you will probably end up with water and ice on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and would buy again if ever needed
customer_reviews.text: Despite previous reviews I'd read, there is no problem whatsoever with the ice or water delivery systems even with a plastic cup. Lovely finish, easy to keep clean and fairly quiet. Very nice product and would buy again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator if you don't mind water dripping down the front of it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this refrigerator, with one exception. Had a problem with water dripping down the front of freezer after dispensing water. Checked the troubleshooting guide and it stated that if this was a problem, it meant you weren't holding your glass under dispenser long enough. Well, those last two drips seem to take forever to do their dripping! So we continuously had a few drops of water running down the front of freezer. Solved the problem by laying a pretty dishcloth in dispenser catch tray and now problem is bearable, if not solved.
customer_reviews.author: Dachshund Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Refrigerator for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice refrigerator for the money! When are refrigerator died, we just went into hard times with life. Then the refrigerator died and we had very little money! This was on the cheep end of size and cost. It is paying off. I wish it had one more door shelves, but you can call and order one more for a small price. Over all its a great product. I have had it for 1 year and its working great!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator works, everything is cold. My concern was the delivery service, although it arrived right on time. There were 3 guys and they had it in ready to go in 15 minutes. This was to replace our garage refrigerator where there’s no water supply, so we didn’t have them connect the water/ ice maker
customer_reviews.author: SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Loud Buzzing sound from Freezer Section
customer_reviews.text: I love this refrigerator, first of all. Its beautiful!! Today, April 5, 2020, it started making a LOUD buzzing noise. Definitely NOT normal operating sounds. I am so disappointed. I will now have to get a technician for a new appliance. Not good. Buyer beware?? I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant at first to buy large purchase through Amazon, but this worked out so well. They delivered during window allotted and removed old fridge. Such a great deal! Fridge is working well and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Swedican

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: My friends still cant get over I got a fridge from Amazon but I love it and the young men that came to set it up were very nice and explained everything making sure I was happy before they left. cant beat free 2 day delivery either!
customer_reviews.author: susan benoit

customer_reviews.title: Constantly breaks down
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE at least once a month, the refrigerator stops being cold. In 6 months, it has been serviced 4 times. Initially, the service tech thought it was a loose wire, in the temperature sensor -- but that wasn't it. Now the tech is just at a loss. The "repairs" are under warranty, but the constantly having food go bad, and trying to schedule a service call is a nightmare. HORRIBLE customer service and lukewarm performance.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Feiser

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to factory known issue
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item. Door would not seal (would frost outside the seal strip) due to warped frame. According to the repair guy...Kenmore knew of this factory related issue. Great thing..,,Amazon’s return policy is bar-none the best!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Loving Our New Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes, the old style is the best! We had a Samsung with French doors and pull out freezer and who could find anything in there. This refrigerator has bigger bins in the doors, easy to find everything and the water filer doesn't take up half the top shelf, but is neatly tucked away at the outside bottom by the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Missing standard accessories
customer_reviews.text: Just had the refrigerator delivered. It seems to work well, but it does not come with the middle drawer that all other refrigerators have. Apparently they make their money by selling it for $200! Very disappointed with this obvious way to squeeze every dollar out of a customer. If I had to order again, I would NOT buy this refrigerator if you want all the accessories that normally come with it.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: broooo' all my beer , meat, and cheese are so cold, even holds cooked/ cooled foods for 1 week plus, because its so cold and good
customer_reviews.author: David C. Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The price might be good but don’t do it. Not digital controls, the water doesn’t come out cold, only the top right of fridge gets cold because it’s the only vent, and it’s extremely loud. One of the shelves broke in the first month. Had it for a year and I wish the thing would break already so I could get a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremybugaj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great refrigerator at a great price. Free delivery and took the old refrigerator away.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s only a couple months in, but this fridge is rocking and rolling. The price was right for my rental so I can completely overlook that it doesn’t have a meat draw like most side by sides.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I am exceedingly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a tremendous value. Prime meant same week delivery, no shipping or set up costs, and the product price was very good. It was so quick and easy, and the fridge is just what I needed. I wish all my appliance purchases had been this easy in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: we’ve liked it. Definitely not the fridge for you need ...
customer_reviews.text: Shelf space was small, especially in the freezer. There are “shelves” on the freezer door, but they’re almost non existsnt. Other than that, we’ve liked it. Definitely not the fridge for you need space though.
customer_reviews.author: Kera Zollinger

customer_reviews.title: It's great but....
customer_reviews.text: One problem. Door stop allows fridge door to open too wide and it slams 180 degrees wide open if I don't catch it. Installer said that that was the correct stop. But I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: esardi

customer_reviews.title: First time ordering a large item like this. Impressed especially with the delivery and set ...
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering a large item like this. Impressed especially with the delivery and set up. Great service and will definitely try on other large purchases. Good job...
customer_reviews.author: doris mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered and set up in less than 3 days!! Lots more room than 22 cu.ft. refrigerator that we replaced with this one. Can't say how reliable it is yet, but so far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: JP Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical at first to see such a feature rich fridge for only $800 but it certainly works, has an ice maker and water dispenser, and even free dlelivery! Purchased several months ago to replace an old dying fridge just in time for the summer and it still works very well; highly recommended if you don't want to spend too much yet still have a fully featured fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best fridge
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker stopped working about a month ago and now the fridge stopped working almost completely just over a year and a half in. Looking into buying a new fridge again. Use your money on a better product. Fridge worked great till it didn’t kinda bummed, oh well love and learn. Hopefully this helps others
customer_reviews.author: Justin Semrau

customer_reviews.title: Great Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator keeps every item very cold. There is three settings cold, recommended, and colder. It has been set on recommended and everything is staying very fresh. The ice maker is another great feature. The only thing that is wrong with the refrigerator is that the motor is fairly loud. If you can get by with this minor flaw, then definitely purchase this refrigerator. I would highly recommend this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Collinsworth

customer_reviews.title: Amasing fridge
customer_reviews.text: It makes ice fast but not as fast as I thought and its great at keeping things at the right temperature
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Terrible delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivery damaged our deck. Fridge is great, however. Have reached out but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This came with free delivery, it also was larger than the others listed for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge for the price little noisy but not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty darn good fridge had it for a couple of weeks it's a little on the noisy side the ice maker and when the motor first kicks in but it works great the guys that installed it did a fantastic job
customer_reviews.author: Lukabogdanovich

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and price, door dispenser is a slight issue as getting ice may also get you water, also this dispenser leaks water on door
customer_reviews.author: PCruzr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Refrig!
customer_reviews.text: It works well! Only complaint is a small dent I noticed later...but it hardly shows...great product for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good fridge but you get what you pay for. No matter how much we try and mess with humidity fruits and veggies dont last too long. Also, ice tray broke just trying to dispense and all ice dropped down. Other than that fridge is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cris V

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I love my new refrigerator works real good did have a little trouble with it getting the water to come through the line but is working good now.
customer_reviews.author: geminii54

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Water does not come out very cold. Good fridge in general. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Wright

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator turns on, runs fine, and cools quickly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice is you are lazy and don’t want to shop around for a fridge
customer_reviews.text: Water tube freezes in the door and stops the water flow. Air flow stops if you fill it to much. Doesn’t hold as much as you would expect. On the plus sides it was cheap and was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Kastanek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and in great condition! Finger prints do show however, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: broken light in freezer due to hard delivery
customer_reviews.text: It works, I had to replace the freezer light which was broken off deep inside the socket.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Joe Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fridge and Delivery Crew!
customer_reviews.text: The crew were professional, friendly and quickly hauled out my old and hooked up my new. It's only been a few hours but the storage is great and the look is very sleek. The design of the water and ice is awesome, too. I can fill up a large cup/water bottle with no problem. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit to old house/tight kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Worthy for such price to get a reasonable refrigerator, it’s fit to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Shams Nikokar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, free, and fast 2-day delivery (including complete installation)!!! Great product. Matches our other appliances perfectly. I will never buy appliances in store again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy warranty they not honoring it
customer_reviews.text: Ice reservoir broken got warranty nobody answers me when I reach out to Kenmore and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: jackie dunklin

customer_reviews.title: I could have bought a giant fridge for what I paid for this small size one
customer_reviews.text: Switch for ice from crushed to cube went out just less than a year old and Rep would not assist.Does not make ice very fast ! Drip Tray for water dispenser not very deep,spills on floor 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Easy process. No problems so far. Fridge is as basic as you can get but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I loved the free installment and removal of my old one! This steel color was great!
customer_reviews.author: Pamy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ref on this price range. Delivery was super fast. Much love to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this appliance except it doesn't have enough shelf space to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again a great price for a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good the whole family loves this refrigerator it has a neat design and functions well on the recommend setting
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: It's doing what I expected it to do. I'm happy ! Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The fridge itself and all its features are great, but it arrived with a dent in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: sehoon,  oh

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product & Great price! I'm in love with my new refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: shipment rcvd on time. everything from unloading to installed went professionally. staff was very good.
customer_reviews.author: A.LALA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was pretty quick, like the refrigerator, wished that when I was shopping for a new refrigerator that I would have remembered to check if there was a drawer for lunch meats , but other than that the refrigerator works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator is at it's LOWEST temperature setting yet freezes ...
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is at it's LOWEST temperature setting yet freezes things in the refrigerator. eg. lettuce, vegetables, fruit, soft items. It isn't freezing liquids. The freezer section works correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hall

customer_reviews.title: delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: In the midst of getting cabinets and backsplashes in comes the Kenmore refridgerator I ordered Through Amazon. It looks good and matches other Kitchen appliances. thanks for on time delivery
customer_reviews.author: Cobwill

customer_reviews.title: really spacious frig and freezer... BUT. ...
customer_reviews.text: really spacious frig and freezer... BUT... if u r a large ice user VERY small ice compartment out of ice by end of day.. Ice cubes very small takes lots to fill large containers

customer_reviews.title: Job not complete.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not complete. Water and ice dispenser not connected.When I called about I was told I didn't have an account. Will not be using again.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be so much roomier than our current one. Yet they are both the exact same dimensions.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The guys who came in and installed it were so professional and fast!! They even leveled it since our floor is tilted. Great product for the price, it’s been a month or two since we ordered it and there hasn’t been any type of issues.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge, not pricey for the quality! Can fit alot of food, looks nice in any kitchen. Workets who delivered it were very professional!

product_meta.title: Kenmore 51783 20.6 cu. ft. Counter-Depth Side-by-Side Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: Size:21 cu. ft. Counter-Depth| Color:StainlessThis Kenmore Counter-Depth Side-by-Side Refrigerator uses space smartly so there’s plenty of room for family-sized groceries in both the freezer and fridge. The SpaceSaver icemaker has been designed on the door so you won't sacrifice an entire shelf for the ice bin. It’s easy to maximize space and stay organized with spill-proof adjustable glass shelves, gallon-sized adjustable door bins, humidity-controlled crisper drawer, dairy shelf, and integrated snack/deli drawer for easy access to everyday items. The CleanFlow Air Filter circulates air through a charcoal air filter, minimizing odors and keeping the air inside the fridge fresh. The SmartSense temperature management system helps maintain consistent temperatures and adjusts humidity in the crisper for optimal freshness. The sleek stainless finish complements any kitchen style.
feature_bullets: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout.
Counter-depth design side-by-side with 20.6 cu. ft. capacity is large enough for big households, frequent entertaining, and storing plenty of frozen foods.
With both the ice maker and the ice bin in the door, the SpaceSaver Ice System frees up more storage space on the freezer shelves, and Accela Ice rapidly makes ice.
CleanFlow Air Filtration actively circulates air through its charcoal filter to keep the fridge smelling fresh.
Stock up and stay organized with spill-proof adjustable glass shelves, gallon-sized adjustable door bins, dairy shelf, and integrated snack drawer.
SmartSense technology senses shifts in temperature and makes adjustments to maintain ideal temperatures to keep foods stay fresh and cool.
Exterior dimension in inches: 35.5W x 27.5D x 69H (top of hinge). Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit.
